resources.string: This User Agreement is a legal contract between you and MyDiary App. By accessing or using the MyDiary app and its services, you agree to be bound by the terms and conditions of this Agreement. If you do not agree with these terms, you will not be able to use the Service.
1.1 You must be at least 13 years old to use the MyDiary App.
1.2 You agree to provide accurate and complete information during the registration process.
1.3 You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account information.
1.1 You own the content you create using the MyDiary App.
1.2 MyDiary App does not claim ownership of your content, but you grant MyDiary App a license to use, display, and distribute your content as necessary for the provision of the service.
1.1 You may not upload, post, or transmit any content that is unlawful, harmful, threatening, abusive, or otherwise objectionable.
1.2 MyDiary App reserves the right to remove any content that violates these terms.
1.1 You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account.
1.2 Notify MyDiary App immediately of any unauthorized use or security breaches.
1.1 You agree not to use the MyDiary App for any illegal or unauthorized purpose.
1.2 You will not use the MyDiary App to violate any laws or regulations in your jurisdiction.
By using the MyDiary App, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by the terms and conditions of this Agreement.
